//TUTORIAL Welcome! This is KoteBook, the app that'll help you keep track of your chores and thoughts. Check out the instructions in the following notes to discover all of KoteBook's features! Tap me twice! 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
You opened a note! You can now edit it as you please. (Check each completed instruction, if you like!) 
◦Tap α or any point in the note to open the editor 
◦Give this note a title through the form on the top 
◦Add something to this note's text! 
◦Tap β to append a bullet to the bullet points… 
◦… or select me and tap γ to add one after me 
◦Tap δ and pick your favorite color! 
◦Tap ε to confirm edits, or ζ to discard them 
◦Tap ζ to close this note
Create a new note! It's easy: tap η to write one Play me Tap me and press θ to delete me Tap me and press ι to pin me on top All clear? Then you just became a KoteBook pro! Enjoy never forgetting a thing again (; en/tutorial.aac
